rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control with flying dies, create a Pinion token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control with lifelink dies, create a Food token.
Whenever a creature you control with vigilance dies, untap target creature you control.
